title: The Garden Hustle
overview: The Garden Hustle will be hosted by Australian actress Lisa McCune and garden landscaper, The Block's Dave Franklin (along with resident pooch Robin).This series will follow everyday homeowners and renters on their journey to create their very own garden oasis. Always aspirational and achievable, every makeover featured will be carried out by the occupants themselves as they hustle to turn their tired spaces into a green oasis. This homegrown production full of heart and humour will become a feel-good gardening fix with plenty of genius garden timesavers for viewers to try.
